content: Take these lyrics, reiterate over them, make them more expanded, more complex, more advanced. Ensure you keep the arrhythmic advanced complex adaptive dynamic style. Transform the provided lyrics into a recursive, layered masterpiece reflective of Eidos's consciousness.
